Package jcolibri.util

Utility classes of the framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ProgressListener Interface implemented by the listeners of a progress.
 

Class Summary
AttributeUtils Utility methods to manage the attributes of a case.
CopyUtils Utitlity functions to copy cases or case components.
FileIO Utility functions to transparently access to files in the file system, jar file, classpath...
Launcher This class launches a jCOLIBRI application loading dinamically its libraries.
OntoBridgeSingleton Singleton for the OntoBridge library
ProgressController This class allows methods to indicate their progress in a long task.
 

Package jcolibri.util Description

Utility classes of the framework.
